channel.title: Rune Perfection - A whole new meaning to rsps
channel.description:
Rune Perfection | 25 Skills | Vote Shop | 5 Minigames | 3000 NPC's | Daily Updates
Rune Perfection | 25 Skills | Vote Shop | 5 Minigames | 20 Bosses | 50+ Teleports | 3000+ Monsters | 100% Uptime | Donation Island | Donation Shop | Fun Pk | Webclient | Desktop Client | Active Staff/Players | Updates Daily | Awesome Website
[url=http://www.pkevolution.com]www.runeperfection.com[/url]
Introduction First of all, welcome to our advertisement topic! We hope this topic will be good enough for you to come and test our amazing server itself. Pk Evolution is a RuneScape Private Server, which brings you back to old school roots. This server is easy to play and it's very fun, compared with other servers out there. It has a lot of difficult challenges including 25 skills and over 3000 monsters to keep players attracted by every single second. Since server name is Pk Evolution, it also has awesome pking with all curses and prayers working very stable and can hold up to 2000 players on each world
Features - Great Economy. You can earn money by doing every single skill and taking down bosses. - Every single skill is trainable. Total of twenty-four to choose from. - Over 50 shops and more coming all the time. - Great combat system with working weapon effects and prayer effects. - Easy usable teleporting system with over 50 teleport locations including all monsters pvp and minigames. - Vote points system to help attract more players to Pk Evolution we will give you points that you can exchange at the vote shop. - More then twenty custom Treasure Trail tasks. Start them by killing monsters and finding your own clue scrolls. - Well coded chatting system. Yell Chat, Clan Chat & Friends Chat. - Very creative home area. A lot of features can be found right there including a custom lottery, Highscores and some fun mini games. - Online browser client, for people that don't want to download a browser client. - Desktop client also available, for people that do not want to play from browsers. - HighScores to battle for best ranks automatically updated. - Monthly community events and wars between player made clans. - All dupes fixed to ensure steady growth of the economy. - Great and respectful staff, without the ability to spawn or cheat, to ensure game play is fair for everyone. - Friendly, nice community and amazing moderators, administrators and support staff.
Webclient [url=http://pkevolution.com/play.php]http://runeperfection.com/play.php[/url]
Forums [url=http://pkevolution.com/forums]Rune Perfection - Discussion Forum[/url]
[img]http://pkevolution.com/images/advert/1.png[/img] [img]http://pkevolution.com/images/advert/2.png[/img] [img]http://pkevolution.com/images/advert/3.png[/img] [img]http://pkevolution.com/images/advert/4.png[/img] [img]http://pkevolution.com/images/advert/5.png[/img] [img]http://pkevolution.com/images/advert/6.png[/img] [img]http://pkevolution.com/images/advert/7.png[/img] [img]http://pkevolution.com/images/advert/8.png[/img]
Play Now [url=http://pkevolution.com/play.php]http://runeperfection.com/play.php[/url]

item.title: Rune Perfection - A whole new meaning to rsps
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Godz Hell was loaded with customs and terrible combat. It was a delta, but to be honest, I feel that we’ve advanced past customs. I have nothing against them; in fact I actually like some of them. Some people just hate them with a deep passion.

Read full topic
item.source: Rune Perfection - A whole new meaning to rsps

item.title: Rune Perfection - A whole new meaning to rsps
item.dc:creator: @PK_Syndicate PK Syndicate
item.description:
@PK_Syndicate wrote:

I would never claim my server to be perfection or anything else it is not, because people will see you as a liar and leave/not join in the first place.

So many people are trying to create “THE BEST SERVAR EVAR” that they forget it should just attract players naturally if they actually do the job right. You won’t have to claim it is the best server, because the players will decide that for you.

Yes, I ceased the opportunity to jack your thread.

Read full topic
item.source: Rune Perfection - A whole new meaning to rsps

item.title: Rune Perfection - A whole new meaning to rsps
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

No, I’m sure those who like customs and what not will like this one but I don’t find this appealing.

Read full topic

Rune Perfection | 25 Skills | Vote Shop | 5 Minigames | 3000 NPC’s | Daily Updates

www.runeperfection.com

Introduction
First of all, welcome to our advertisement topic! We hope this topic will be good enough for you to come and test our amazing server itself. 
Pk Evolution is a RuneScape Private Server, which brings you back to old school roots. This server is easy to play and it's very fun, compared with other servers out there. It has a lot of difficult challenges including 25 skills and over 3000 monsters to keep players attracted by every single second. Since server name is Pk Evolution, it also has awesome pking with all curses and prayers working very stable and can hold up to 2000 players on each world

Features
- Great Economy. You can earn money by doing every single skill and taking down bosses.
- Every single skill is trainable. Total of twenty-four to choose from.
- Over 50 shops and more coming all the time.
- Great combat system with working weapon effects and prayer effects.
- Easy usable teleporting system with over 50 teleport locations including all monsters pvp and minigames.
- Vote points system to help attract more players to Pk Evolution we will give you points that you can exchange at the vote shop.
- More then twenty custom Treasure Trail tasks. Start them by killing monsters and finding your own clue scrolls.
- Well coded chatting system. Yell Chat, Clan Chat & Friends Chat.
- Very creative home area. A lot of features can be found right there including a custom lottery, Highscores and some fun mini games.
- Online browser client, for people that don't want to download a browser client.
- Desktop client also available, for people that do not want to play from browsers.
- HighScores to battle for best ranks automatically updated.
- Monthly community events and wars between player made clans.
- All dupes fixed to ensure steady growth of the economy.
- Great and respectful staff, without the ability to spawn or cheat, to ensure game play is fair for everyone.
- Friendly, nice community and amazing moderators, administrators and support staff.
